text: Find out how many times a regex matches in a string in Python
Is there a way that I can find out how many matches of a regex are in a string in Python?
For example, if I have the string "It actually happened when it acted out of turn.

childList.text: "It actually happened when it acted out of turn."

text: I want to know how many times "t a" appears in the string.
In that string, "t a" appears twice.
I want my function to tell me it appeared twice.
